CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin Units support for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability we are extending the Admin Units capability currently available in Microsoft Purview Information Protection and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) to DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin Units support for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
OldVersion.description: With this capability we are extending the Admin Units capability currently available in Microsoft Purview Information Protection and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) to DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Reactions in Outlook for GCC High and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: We will be enabling reactions in Outlook, a feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant, for customers in GCC High and DoD.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Reactions in Outlook for GCC High and DoD
OldVersion.description: We will be enabling reactions in Outlook, a feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant, for customers in GCC High and DoD.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Referenced sources are cited in drafted content
CurrentVersion.description: When drafting content that's based on referenced sources, Copilot includes citations in the text it generates, indicating references to information in the content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Referenced sources are cited in drafted content
CurrentVersion.description: When drafting content that's based on referenced sources, Copilot includes citations in the text it generates, indicating references to information in the content.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Teams Integrations with OneNote Meeting Details
CurrentVersion.description: In addition to basic information about a meeting such as date, description, and attendees, Meeting Details will now add content from Teams’ intelligent meeting recap. This includes AI-generated meeting notes, AI-suggested tasks, and any documents shared during the Teams meeting.

OldVersion.title: OneNote: Teams Integrations with OneNote Meeting Details
OldVersion.description: In addition to basic information about a meeting such as date, description, and attendees, Meeting Details will now add content from Teams’ intelligent meeting recap. This includes AI-generated meeting notes, AI-suggested tasks, and any documents shared during the Teams meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Scheduled prompts
CurrentVersion.description: Plan ahead by scheduling essential prompts for repeated tasks in Copilot chat. Create a productive routine that helps you stay organized and efficient.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Scheduled prompts
OldVersion.description: Plan ahead by scheduling essential prompts for repeated tasks in Copilot chat. Create a productive routine that helps you stay organized and efficient.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Microsoft 365 Groups scoping in Teams DLP policy extend protection to 1:1/n chats
CurrentVersion.description: When scoping policies to Microsoft 365 Groups in Teams DLP policies, members of Teams standard and shared channel chats associated with the groups are currently protected by the policies. This change will automatically extend the protection to standard/shared channels chats in other Microsfot 365 Groups and 1:1/n (non-channel) chats. There is no longer a need to add users, security groups or other Microsoft 365 groups to protect these chats, except for customers that have enabled optical character recognition (OCR) in Teams chat.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Microsoft 365 Groups scoping in Teams DLP policy extend protection to 1:1/n chats
OldVersion.description: When scoping policies to Microsoft 365 Groups in Teams DLP policies, members of Teams standard and shared channel chats associated with the groups are currently protected by the policies. This change will automatically extend the protection to standard/shared channels chats in other Microsfot 365 Groups and 1:1/n (non-channel) chats. There is no longer a need to add users, security groups or other Microsoft 365 groups to protect these chats, except for customers that have enabled optical character recognition (OCR) in Teams chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse data available in Insights Analyst Workbench
CurrentVersion.description: HR analysts and admins can access aggregated Pulse survey results across the organization and slice and dice the survey results to analyze Pulse survey results by organizational attributes (Ex. organizational hierarchy, job level, job function, geographic location, etc.).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse data available in Insights Analyst Workbench
OldVersion.description: HR analysts and admins can access aggregated Pulse survey results across the organization and slice and dice the survey results to analyze Pulse survey results by organizational attributes (Ex. organizational hierarchy, job level, job function, geographic location, etc.).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - New question types
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Pulse authors can add new question types, including matrix types, and leverage enhanced logic to drive more targeted survey experiences for respondents.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - New question types
OldVersion.description: Viva Pulse authors can add new question types, including matrix types, and leverage enhanced logic to drive more targeted survey experiences for respondents.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Automatically display auto-mapped calendars
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to automatically see their auto-mapped calendars when toggling from classic Outlook to the new. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Automatically display auto-mapped calendars
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to automatically see their auto-mapped calendars when toggling from classic Outlook to the new. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Write a prompt for selected portions of text in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Writing a prompt to draft content based on your selection no longer expands your selection to the entire paragraph, table, or list. You can prompt based on a single sentence or item.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Write a prompt for selected portions of text in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Writing a prompt to draft content based on your selection no longer expands your selection to the entire paragraph, table, or list. You can prompt based on a single sentence or item.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Inline preview of files shared
CurrentVersion.description: Now you can review a file shared in chat and channels in your flow of work. Select ‘preview’ and scroll through the file’s content without leaving the chat or channel.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Inline preview of files shared
OldVersion.description: Now you can review a file shared in chat and channels in your flow of work. Select ‘preview’ and scroll through the file’s content without leaving the chat or channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – AI enabled file summaries on Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly get a summary of Word, PPT, and PDF files that were shard with you in chat, without leaving your flow of work. Tap the summary icon on the file, and get a summary generated by Copilot. Now you can consume and comprehend the content without reading the entire document on a small mobile screen.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – AI enabled file summaries on Teams mobile
OldVersion.description: Quickly get a summary of Word, PPT, and PDF files that were shard with you in chat, without leaving your flow of work. Tap the summary icon on the file, and get a summary generated by Copilot. Now you can consume and comprehend the content without reading the entire document on a small mobile screen.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Authorized group setting in Microsoft Edge for Business
CurrentVersion.description: The authorized group setting ensures that Edge respects the settings for "Printer groups," "Removable USB device groups," and "Network share groups" in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. This change will prevent users from bypassing Data Loss Prevention (DLP) protections by using Edge, thereby enhancing security and compliance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Authorized group setting in Microsoft Edge for Business
OldVersion.description: The authorized group setting ensures that Edge respects the settings for "Printer groups," "Removable USB device groups," and "Network share groups" in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. This change will prevent users from bypassing Data Loss Prevention (DLP) protections by using Edge, thereby enhancing security and compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved reporting – Additional report fields in the Time Clock export
CurrentVersion.description: We’ve expanded the functionality of the time clock export report by adding additional fields from Shifts. This enhancement provides you with a more comprehensive and detailed view of your scheduling data, making it easier to analyze and manage workforce activities.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved reporting – Additional report fields in the Time Clock export
OldVersion.description: We’ve expanded the functionality of the time clock export report by adding additional fields from Shifts. This enhancement provides you with a more comprehensive and detailed view of your scheduling data, making it easier to analyze and manage workforce activities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Metrics reporting via Data Export
CurrentVersion.description: Enterprises can get aggregate metrics on Academy, Content consumption, and user clicks.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: "None" color category for Mail and Calendar in the New Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: We’ve introduced a new "None" color category for Mail and Calendar in the New Outlook for Windows and Web. This update provides more flexibility and customization in categorizing your emails and calendar events. By selecting the "None" option, users can now choose to have items without a designated color, allowing for cleaner organization and more control over which items stand out visually. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: "None" color category for Mail and Calendar in the New Outlook for Windows and Web
OldVersion.description: We’ve introduced a new "None" color category for Mail and Calendar in the New Outlook for Windows and Web. This update provides more flexibility and customization in categorizing your emails and calendar events. By selecting the "None" option, users can now choose to have items without a designated color, allowing for cleaner organization and more control over which items stand out visually. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: End the Session for Attendees and Presenters Return to Green Room
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers and presenters can now end the session with this new "End Event" button for town halls, webinars, and structured meetings. After selecting this button, attendees will see a message on stage stating that the session has concluded, and presenters will return to the Green Room.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: End the Session for Attendees and Presenters Return to Green Room
OldVersion.description: Organizers and presenters can now end the session with this new "End Event" button for town halls, webinars, and structured meetings. After selecting this button, attendees will see a message on stage stating that the session has concluded, and presenters will return to the Green Room.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - New email scoring capabilities
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider risk management (IRM) email scoring logic is being updated. With current logic, a single email to multiple recipients (say “n”) is counted multiple times (n times), and this is creating noise by increasing the risk score. In the new logic, a single email to multiple recipients is counted once, and this new principle is applicable to the email containing multiple unallowed domains or priority content. Once this is rolled out, all the email insights in alerts will display the new count and score.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Choose save location when saving to a cloud account in the Outlook app for iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: When you save a document to a cloud account, you will be able to browse through the folders of that account to find the place you would like to save your file.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Easily start a new email from document previewer in the Outlook app for Android
CurrentVersion.description: From the document previewer, there will now be an option to start a new mail with the document being viewed added to that new email
